select * from project_main_tb where 1 = 1
and project_name like concat('%', #{project_name}, '%')
and chn_name like concat('%', #{chn_name}, '%')
and principal like concat('%', #{principal}, '%')

select c.* from project_stage_tb b, project_stage_doc_tb c where b.project_no = #{project_no} and b.doc_serial = c.serial_no and b.stage_num = #{stage_num} and c.file_path is not null and c.file_path != '' order by doc_version desc
